title: Chosen Series Collection
description: Romance, adventure, spectacular world building, and a serendipitous love story that will steal your heart and keep you turning the pages await you in this epic Sci-fi/Paranormal Romance saga. Start the award-winning Chosen Series today.This collection includes three full-length novels, Books 1-3 of the Chosen Series, as well as two bonus scenes previously only published in limited edition anthologies.
author: Stacy  Jones
